title: Extra: Preparing for Congressional Testimony
itunes:title: Extra: Preparing for Congressional Testimony
description:
Bloomberg's Chief Washington Correspondent talks to former CBO Director and American Action Forum President Douglas Holtz-Eakin and Adam Hodge, former DNC Communications Director about what its like to prepare for and testify before a Congressional committee.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
